review: I was eagerly waiting for this product to get back in stock to be able to buy it. I really love collecting such tech products (like a hobby!) but also to me chromecast showed a lot of future potential in it. unfortunately it didn't work for me!As easy as it seems setting up this product gave me a hard time! Everytime I try to connect it with my home wifi, my wifi crashes and I don't see it among the network list until I restart my router again. tried several times using different devices (my windows laptop, android cellphone, an iphone) all with the same result. I called google play tech support they tried figuring out the problem while on the phone and they kept working on it with me on e-mails but nothing changed I even called my internet company who provided the router making sure about the router's default settings and we tried changing to several channels but still nothing worked.I eventually gave up and decided to return it.I really hope google finds a solution for this problem soon because I really want to have it!so in general if you like me have westell ultraline series3 router (provided by cincinnati bell) you probably won't be able to enjoy chromecast for now. btw my router never failed me in any of the other devices
